Title: BBVA AI Factory at FinCausal 2023: a RoBERTa Fine-tuned Model for Causal Detection
Abstract: the extraction of causal information is an important task during the automatic processing of documents in the finance domain. in this work we present a system to identify cause and effect text spans in financial documents to solve the spanish subtask of the fincausa1 2023 shared task  financial document causality detection . our system relies on a pretrained transformer based language model ‚äì roberta large ‚äì trained with data from the spanish national library  biblioteca nacional de espa√±a bne . after the fine tuning of our solution we achieved f1 and exact match scores of 0.91 and 0.56 respectively.
